languages.text: {n}Гнев во взгляде Уралона сменяется на удивление... и затем торжество.{/n} "Ты молвишь имя третьего восхода. Ты явил{mf|ся|ась} не как раб{mf||а} трупа на троне, а как слуга нашего Господина. Коль так, то я не буду биться с тобой, но позволю тебе разделить великую честь — пролить кровь ложноверцев в священном обряде!"

{n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"
languages.original_text: {n}Гнев во взгляде Уралона сменяется на удивление... и затем торжество.{/n} "Ты молвишь имя третьего восхода. Ты явил{mf|ся|ась} не как раб{mf||а} трупа на троне, а как слуга нашего Господина. Коль так, то я не буду биться с тобой, но позволю тебе разделить великую честь — пролить кровь ложноверцев в священном обряде!"

traits.locale_text: "And I am a part of that thread which holds it together as it extends into the future." {n}Wrath gives way to triumph in Uralon's eyes.{/n} "You speak the words of the Primordial Truth. Does this mean you have come to me not as a slave to the corpse emperor but as a servant of our Master? If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

Does this mean you have come to me not as a slave to the corpse emperor but as a servant of our Master? If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆眼中的怒火消失了，他惊讶地看着你，随后脸上露出了胜利的笑容。{/n}“你诉说着第三黎明的真理。这意味着，你并不是尸皇的奴隶，而是我们主人的仆人。如果是这样的话，我不会与你战斗。相反，我会允许你分享伟大的荣耀。在这场神圣的仪式中，尽情挥洒伪神信徒的鲜血吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆眼中的怒火消失了，他惊讶地看着你，随后脸上露出了胜利的笑容。{/n}“你诉说着第三黎明的真理。这意味着，你并不是尸皇的奴隶，而是我们主人的仆人。如果是这样的话，我不会与你战斗。相反，我会允许你分享伟大的荣耀。在这场神圣的仪式中，尽情挥洒伪神信徒的鲜血吧！”

languages.text: {n}Die Wut in Uralons Augen weicht zuerst Überraschung und schließlich Triumph.{/n} "Ihr sprecht den Namen der Dritten Dämmerung aus. Ihr seid nicht als {mf|Sklave|Sklavin} des Leichenimperators zu mir gekommen, sondern als {mf|Diener|Dienerin} unseres Meisters. Wenn dem so ist, werde ich nicht gegen Euch kämpfen, sondern Euch stattdessen gestatten, an einer großen Ehre teilzuhaben: Wir vergießen in einem heiligen Ritual das Blut falscher Gläubiger!"
languages.original_text: {n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

traits.locale_text: "Und ich bin Teil dieses Fadens, der auf dem Weg in die Zukunft alles zusammenhält." {n}Zorn weicht in Uralons Augen Triumph.{/n} "Ihr sprecht die Worte der Primordialen Wahrheit. Heißt das, dass Ihr nicht als {mf|Sklave|Sklavin} des Leichenimperators zu mir gekommen seid, sondern als {mf|Diener|Dienerin} unseres Meisters? Wenn dem so ist, werde ich nicht gegen Euch kämpfen, sondern Euch stattdessen gestatten, an einer großen Ehre teilzuhaben: Wir vergießen in einem heiligen Ritual das Blut falscher Gläubiger!"

languages.text: {n}La mirada colérica de Uralon da paso a la sorpresa y luego se torna triunfal.{/n} «Has pronunciado el nombre del Tercer Amanecer. En ese caso, acudes a mí no como esclav{mf|o|a} del emperador cadáver, sino como sierv{mf|o|a} de nuestro maestro. En tal caso no lucharé contra ti, ¡sino que te permitiré compartir el gran honor de derramar la sangre de los falsos creyentes en un ritual sagrado!».
languages.original_text: {n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada colérica de Uralon da paso a la sorpresa y luego se torna triunfal.{/n} «Has pronunciado el nombre del Tercer Amanecer. En ese caso, acudes a mí no como esclav{mf|o|a} del emperador cadáver, sino como sierv{mf|o|a} de nuestro maestro. En tal caso no lucharé contra ti, ¡sino que te permitiré compartir el gran honor de derramar la sangre de los falsos creyentes en un ritual sagrado!».

languages.text: {n}Dans les yeux d'Uralon, la colère laisse place à la surprise, puis au triomphe.{/n} « Vous parlez de la Troisième Aube. Cela signifie que vous vous présentez devant moi non pas en tant qu'esclave de l'Empereur-Cadavre, mais en tant que {mf|serviteur|servante} de notre maître. Si tel est le cas, je ne vous affronterai pas. Au contraire, je partagerai avec vous un grand honneur : nous verserons le sang des faux croyants lors d'un rituel sacré ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans les yeux d'Uralon, la colère laisse place à la surprise, puis au triomphe.{/n} « Vous parlez de la Troisième Aube. Cela signifie que vous vous présentez devant moi non pas en tant qu'esclave de l'Empereur-Cadavre, mais en tant que {mf|serviteur|servante} de notre maître. Si tel est le cas, je ne vous affronterai pas. Au contraire, je partagerai avec vous un grand honneur : nous verserons le sang des faux croyants lors d'un rituel sacré ! »

languages.text: {n}ウラロンの目に宿る怒りは、驚きへと変化し、やがて得意げな表情が浮かぶ。{/n}「お前は第三の黎明の名を語った。すなわち、死体の皇帝の奴隷としてではなく、我らが主の下僕として来たということか？もしそうなら、俺はお前と戦わず、神聖な儀式で偽信者の血を流すという偉大な栄誉を分かち合うことを許可しよう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンの目に宿る怒りは、驚きへと変化し、やがて得意げな表情が浮かぶ。{/n}「お前は第三の黎明の名を語った。すなわち、死体の皇帝の奴隷としてではなく、我らが主の下僕として来たということか？もしそうなら、俺はお前と戦わず、神聖な儀式で偽信者の血を流すという偉大な栄誉を分かち合うことを許可しよう！」

languages.text: {n}Uralon'un gözlerindeki hışım; önce yerini şaşkınlığa, sonra da utkuya bırakıyor.{/n} "Üçüncü Şafak'ın sözlerini söyledin. Karşıma ceset imparatorun bir kölesi olarak değil, efendimizin bir hizmetkârı olarak çıktın. Öyleyse seninle savaşmayacağım. Aksine büyük bir şerefe nail olacaksın. Birlikte kutsal bir ayinde imansızların kanını dökeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The wrath in Uralon's eyes gives way to surprise, then triumph.{/n} "You speak the name of the Third Dawn. You have come to me not as a thrall to the corpse emperor, but as a servant of our master. If that is so, I will not fight you, and instead will allow you to share the great honour of spilling the blood of false believers in a sacred ritual!"
